body: This spell allows you to turn ammunition (such as arrows, crossbow bolts, shuriken, and sling stones) into fiery projectiles. Each piece of ammunition deals an extra 1d6 points of fire damage to any target it hits. A flaming projectile can easily ignite a flammable object or structure, but it won't ignite a creature it strikes.
level_text: Arcanist: 3; Bloodrager: 3; Elementalist Wizard: 3; Magus: 3; Sorcerer: 3; Wizard: 3

effects.text: fifty projectiles, all of which must be together at the time of casting
effects.name: Target

components.text: a drop of oil and a small piece of flint

component_text: V, S, M (a drop of oil and a small piece of flint)
name: Flame Arrow
